newsitem.title: USA: EuroMed Inc names Shuey CEO.
newsitem.headline: EuroMed Inc names Shuey CEO.

text.p: EuroMed Inc said Thursday Robert Shuey III was elected chief executive officer.
He will serve as CEO until a candidate with pharmaceutical and public company experience is elected by the board.
On Nov 13, EuroMed said it named N.T.P. Roozekrans president and CEO. The company was not immediately available to comment on Roozenkrans' status with the company.
The company also said it is interviewing independent public accountants to replace its former independent public accountants, KPMG Accountants, N.V.
EuroMed, engaged in the import and wholesale distribution of branded and generic pharmaceuticals within the Netherlands, previously said KPMG resigned as its independent accounting firm.
